attributes.action: to allow david wood to undergo the sex change operation he so urgently needs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to allow david woods to finally be granted his only wish of becoming a woman so that he will fully understand what its like to be a woman and to have to stay at home minding the kids that he so adores and that he can finally let go all those silly ideas of living a single mans life and finally grow into a normal human being namely a woman !!!!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
